com.samskivert.util
Class QuickSort

java.lang.Object
  com.samskivert.util.QuickSort

public class QuickSort
extends Object

A class to sort arrays of objects (quickly even).

Sorts the specified subset of the supplied array from least to greatest, using the supplied comparator.

Parameters:
a - the array of objects to be sorted.
lo0 - the index of the lowest element to be included in the sort.
hi0 - the index of the highest element to be included in the sort.
comp - the comparator to use to establish ordering between elements.
